targets.expr:
sum(rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.+", monitor="default"}[$__interval])) without (device)
  /
count(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.+", monitor="default"}) without (device)

sum(rate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="",device=~"sd.+"}[$__interval])) without (device)
  /
count(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="",device=~"sd.+"}) without (device)

avg(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.*", monitor="default"}[$__interval])) by (fqdn)
+ 
avg(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.*", monitor="default"}[$__interval])) by (fqdn)

node_filesystem_size_bytes{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device="/dev/sdb", monitor="default"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device="/dev/sdb", monitor="default"}

avg(rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.*", monitor="default"}[$__interval])) by (fqdn)
+ 
avg(rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{environment="$env", tier="stor", type="gitaly", device=~"sd.*", monitor="default"}[$__interval])) by (fqdn)
